{{zh-pron
|m=qǔyì

|mn=qz,xm,zz:khiok-gē
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}
# [[quyi]]; a category of traditional, usually non-staged, Chinese vocal art forms such as ballad singing ({{zh-l|唱曲}}, chàngqǔ), [[storytelling]] ({{zh-l|說書}}, shuōshū), comic dialogues ({{zh-l|小品}}, xiǎopǐn), [[clapper talk]] ({{zh-l|快板}}, kuàibǎn), and [[crosstalk]] ({{zh-l|相聲}}, xiàngshēng)

====Usage notes====
The term {{lang|zh|曲藝／曲艺}} acquired wide usage only after 1949. It is nearly synonymous with the earlier term {{zh-l|說唱}}.
